message.body:
Syracuse is playing unbelievable. U guys must be celebrating big time.
I'm not sure if I saw the right charges for rooms at embassy suite but if $109 is right we should book for next year. What did u see
I didn't see those rates did you?
Yeah it is unreal. Looking up prices for Atlanta...
The rates I saw for downtown embassy suites was $109 plus tax $128 for 2 room suite with king bed and pull out. I might be looking at wrong embassy suite.
I checked and didn't see any rates. I called and said lady said they didn't have rates yet. But if you saw that it is good. Embassy downtown is the one.
I will keep an I on it. Good luck next week
